tA6vuY2IFbhR3RdL4.name: Flexibility (Double-Jointed)
tA6vuY2IFbhR3RdL4.notes: May ignore up to -5 in penalties for close quarters

m0gMXMcrI0CNQ6e7-.name: Easy to Hit
m0gMXMcrI0CNQ6e7-.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

t8BK6It57jesWQrJT.name: Code of Honor (Soldier's)
t8BK6It57jesWQrJT.notes: The Wapawab and loyalty to the creche.

tgsVYDwNES6vTyhj3.name: Honesty
tgsVYDwNES6vTyhj3.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

tzkqclKVQC9cPd_Po.name: Attentive
tzkqclKVQC9cPd_Po.notes: +1 bonus when working on lengthy tasks, but -3 to notice any important interruption

txwuc3LDp0bRoBM8O.name: Finds comfort and security in complexity.
